Address: 43 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Live the lifestyle and enjoy the view
Positioned to take advantage of the panoramic views over Corio Bay, this property has plenty to offer the astute buyer. The ground floor includes a study, two separate bedrooms and family bathroom. Upstairs the open plan living area and master bedroom boast captivating views over the Bay. The kitchen has been fully renovated complete with stainless steel appliances.
Low maintenance gardens with outdoor undercover entertainment area and a swimming pool. Make the sea change and enjoy all that the Bellarine has to offer.
Insights: 43 Beacon Point Road, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2015 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 71 Country Club Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Opportunities Abound- Views!!
The owners of this extremely neat family home have lived here for the past 35 years and reluctantly have decided the time has come to move on to something a little smaller. Set on a generous 614m2 allotment the home offers 3 bedrooms plus study or small 4th bedroom- terrific bay views from the upstairs bedrooms. The downstairs lounge and formal dining rooms adjoin a spacious kitchen and meals area which in turn flows out to the undercover outdoor entertainment area. A full ensuite, 3 WC's, plenty of storage, gas heating, water tanks, double remote garage are just some of the features of this pretty property. Make an appointment to view today!

Description:
Spacious Family Home in Court Location
Ideally located in a quiet court and just a short walk to shops, schools, park and a boat ramp this family home offers lots of space inside and outside. It’s positioned on a large allotment of 852m2 approx. and offers:
- 4 good size bedrooms, master with ensuite and walk in robe. Second and third bedrooms have built in robes
- 2 separate living areas
- Spacious lounge and dining area with fire place and reverse cycle air conditioning
- Updated kitchen with ample cupboard space, gas cooktop, electric oven and dish washer
- Central bathroom and separate toilet
- Great size yard and a shed
- Alfresco area
- Plenty off street parking, room for caravan and a boat
- Currently leased to a great tenant at $320pw
Extras include: Central gas heating, R/C A/C and wood heater

Description:
Family Home with Bay Views
This immaculately presented home with views across Corio Bay to the You Yangs, is situated within walking distance to the Clifton Springs foreshore. The layout provides a large formal lounge across from the master bedroom with full ensuite and WIR.
A functional galley style kitchen overlooks the dining area and open plan second living area. Step through the sliding doors onto an elevated deck where you can sit and relax while taking in the water views. There are two further bedrooms, generous in size, linked to a central bathroom. The home offers an under house area that has been converted into a storeroom and workshop. The package is complete with a double carport.

Description:
Modern home with exquisite bay views
'Edgewater' says it all! Set on high ground beside the silvery waters of Corio Bay, this home is graced with intoxicating views of the bay, You Yangs and Geelong, and is one of the few homes within a 200m walk to the bay beach.
Bathed in natural light from morning to night, the home is cleverly zoned to accommodate friends and family privately. Recently renovated and extended, the new 2-storey façade boasts contemporary form that melds well with the existing rendered brick design. Upstairs, the floorplan is geared towards parental luxury, boasting a superb living zone that maximises the exquisite views, and a balcony providing unobstructed vision. The master BR with walk-in robes sits close to a classy shower room and separate toilet. A further multipurpose room augurs well as a nursery or den. Complete with ducted gas heating, split system AC and ceiling fan, this naturally warm level is an absolute asset.
Downstairs the floorplan is expansive. Entry is into the modern and uniquely designed living hub offering kitchen, dining and living zones. Dining connects with an eye-catching courtyard and garden at the façade. The living space is all about the serene water views. The views are also showcased in the kitchen through a wide servery window. Sleek cabinetry, stainless steel appliances and a Belfast sink denote quality. The fully-fitted walk-in pantry is a bonus to any Mum or chef. Towards the rear, the minor bedrooms and wet areas bud off a central hallway that accesses the rear north facing deck. This zone offers; 3 bedrooms (2 doubles with built-in robes), a fresh family bathroom, separate toilet, laundry and linen store.
Relax on the rear deck in full view of the productive fruit and vegetable garden and separate sundeck. The deck links to a purpose-built office bright with northerly light, built-in desk and computer cabling. The single garage is tucked to the side, further privatising the backyard. A detached storeroom(workshop with electrics) sits in the back corner of the garden boasting great potential as a 'man cave'.
Enjoy an inspection and imagine these views as the backdrop to your life!
- Recently extended home with wide views over Corio Bay, You Yangs and Geelong
- Within a 200m walk to the bay beach and bayside walking trails
- Floorplan full of natural light and zoned to accommodate guests in privacy
- Upstairs; living with views, master BR, classy shower room plus multipurpose room
- Downstairs; quality OP living/kitchen/dining, 3BRs, family bathroom and office
- SLUG, front courtyard, rear decks, productive gardens and 'man cave'
Conjunctional Agent: Vendor Advocacy Australia Contact: Ian Stewart 0412 241 785
Land: 585 sq m approx.

Description:
An immaculate finish & A VIEW TO BUY FOR!
The homes with the best of views tend to be tightly held. Until now. Take advantage of the opportunity to secure a beautiful home, well finished, on a large allotment with incredible, elevated, panoramic Northern views spanning 180 degrees.
Clifton Springs still very affordable and is the well-kept secret on the Bellarine. The location offers a short walk to the waterfront or golf course or a short drive to a number of the peninsulas best attractions, including award winning wineries, historical sites, great beaches, regular markets, annual events AND neighbours Queenscliff where you can jump on the ferry and enjoy a day trip on the Mornington peninsula.
With an unassuming facade and recently adding a substantial extension to capitalize on the extraordinary views, the home
is built over 2 stories and comprises 3 bedrooms + study, 2 bathroom, 2 living areas, dining, kitchen, laundry, loads of storage and much more. The main living space upstairs is North facing with floor to ceiling, tinted windows and opens out to an entertainers paradise. The large balcony/deck is under cover, takes in exquisite views to the North of Port Phillip Bay and the You Yangs and boasts retractable blinds to make a usable Alfresco all year round. The Kitchen is centrally located, open plan to the meals area and includes dishwasher and gas cooking. The Kitchen, Meals, Living also takes in views to the West and North and opens out to the Northern decking. The master bedroom is isolated from the living areas of the home for privacy and includes full ensuite and opens out onto a private deck surrounded by established gardens and soaking in the sensational views to the North.
Outside, an above ground pool, ample shedding, open spaces, a choice of places to sit and established landscapes make this a truly unique home and must be inspected to be appreciated. Call Dion on 0424 940 629 to arrange an inspection.
Dion Plumb : 0424 940 629
Insights: 45 Dandarriga Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2020 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 114 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Perfect Downsizer
This home is the ideal find for anyone looking to downsize while still having the privacy of your own 607sqm property. This well presented home with polished timber floors boasts a spacious lounge and dining area adjacent to the kitchen, featuring a modern design with stainless steel appliances. The light filled living zones look out to beautifully manicured gardens bringing the outside in. The two bedrooms are generous in size and have built in robes.
Extra features of the property are the secure storage shed at the rear of the carport with a mezzanine level above ideal for a home office or guest quarters. Plenty of room for the boat or caravan.

Description:
Room For Everyone And More!
This contemporary family home delivers on relaxed coastal living! An on-trend floorplan has everything a modern family needs: 5 beds, 2 baths, 2 large living and dining zones and deck ensures that there is space to entertain, room for the kid's to unwind and parents to retreat. Better still, the beach is just down the road, and from here, school, shops and public transport are all within an easy distance.
Modern interiors offer hardy tiling and fresh walls, with low-maintenance features inside and out.
The zone-able lounge and dining area is ideal for entertaining with French doors that open to the sunny entertaining deck. The relaxed open-plan kitchen living and meals is the perfect relaxed family hub. Pull up a seat to the vast Island bench to catch up on homework. The kitchen with dishwasher, wall oven and gas hob are ideal for family catering. Plenty of cupboards offer clutter-free storage.
The kid's wing has 3 large bedrooms, each with a built-in robe, and a generous bathroom with deep bath shower and vanity, and separate toilet.
The 4th bedroom, with built-in robe, is close to the entry and makes an ideal guest's room or peaceful home office.
Parent's can retreat to the comfortable master bedroom with 'his and hers' walk-in robes. The large en suite has tidy cabinetry, oversized shower and toilet.
Reverse cycle air-conditioning to the main living hub and gas ducted heating throughout.
Outside, the fully fenced and low-maintenance garden offers screening and privacy. The double lock-up garage has two separate roller doors, and a gravel driveway provides off-street parking for boat or camper.
Step into a relaxed coastal lifestyle sooner. Inspect ASAP.
- Close to beach, schools & shops
- Master with en suite & WIR
- 4 BRs with BIRs
- 2 open-plan living & dining zones
- Entertaining deck with low-maintenance garden
- DLUG plus off-street parking for boat/camper
Land: 630 sq m approx.

Address: 97 Beacon Point Road CLIFTON SPRINGS VIC 3222
Description:
A Home Like No Other!
This extraordinary property set on an approx. 850m2 can accommodate quite a crowd within the main residence and a self-contained bungalow. A total of 5 large bedrooms plus study or indeed 6th for the largest of families. Enclosed within an atrium, a spa room has decadently direct access to a huge master bedroom. Upstairs, two living zones flank a country-size kitchen, and 3 more bedrooms are serviced by a family bathroom. Alfresco living is supplied by a sundeck and balcony, as well as verandah to the bungalow. Alongside the carport, the double auto garage/mancave features a bar. This truly is a wonderful location, with bayside beaches and dog walking area are at one end of the street, along with great shopping, schools, medical facilities, cafes, restaurants at the other. On the residential rather than the tourist side of the peninsula means life here is settled, tranquil and imbued with community spirit. If you're looking for further land to complete this already substantial home, you can put your mark on the block next door which is approx. 707m2 of endless opportunities. Inspection is a must as homes like this do not come up very often that offer so much at a remarkable price.
Robert Kules : 0403 059 059

Description:
Do You Like The Idea Of A Court Location?
Just listed tucked away in a quiet court away from the hustle and bustle. This home is close to the boat ramp for the fisherman, the golf club for the golfer, the water's edge for walking the dog or the kids on bikes or walking yourself. Great views across Corio Bay only a short walk away. A suburb that offers the makings of a relaxed enjoyable lifestyle. Only twenty minutes from Geelong on the Bellarine Peninsula is a suburb called Clifton Springs, established many years ago but still a hidden gem. Two living zones that can be closed off from one another, three bedrooms, study or fourth bedroom main with WIR and ensuite. Second living open plan kitchen, meals and family. Secure backyard and double garage complete this home.

Description:
" LYNNWOOD", Character & History
The home, originally built in Moorabool Street Geelong in 1882, was relocated to its present site in Clifton Springs in 2005. Some of the stand out features include 2 double sided chimneys rebuilt to original specifications and servicing the 4 bedrooms with four uniquely different fireplace surrounds, 11'ceilings, Original 1&1/4" thick Baltic pine flooring throughout, and original doors and fittings. The curved kitchen bench built of cedar originally from the old Hamilton Hotel and antique french doors from Paris. The second building to the rear, built in the 1905 was originally the local chappel at Snake Valley servicing the Gold mining community of the time, with its stained glass windows and unique domed ceiling would make a fabulous home studio. It has been a labour of love by the present owner to bring these historic building back to their original glory. Modern features include: new plumbing, new wiring, new roofing and all council permits in place. Property is to be sold at Auction.
Insights: 28 Derribong Way, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2015 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.
